nodeUserchoice.field_checkboxtext2: To learn more about heart disease in dogs:

field_bottombodytext.processed: Each case will earn you 20 minutes of CPD

field_bottomtitle.processed: Build both your clinical and communication skills in canine heart disease and prolong the lives of dogs with the help of this simple, fun digital tool.

field_toprighttext.processed: You will need sound for part of this activity.
